channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For A Party Of ‘Joy,’ Democrats Are Awfully Miserable
item.description: Democrats have let the joyless, leftist monster out of the closet, and there's no sign it wants to go back inside.

item.title: Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva, 77, dies after battle with lung cancer
item.description: Longtime Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva has died at 77 after a "long brave battle" with lung cancer, his office announced in a statement Thursday.
